summary: A test suite that verifies the correctness of utilities converting raw dictionary responses into structured chat completion model responses, covering scenarios such as image inputs, basic conversions, error cases, function outputs, JSON mode handling, tool call argument validation, logprob inclusion, and image generation warnings.
business_intent: To guarantee that LLM response transformation utilities reliably produce standardized model response objects across diverse use cases, thereby supporting stable integration of language model outputs in applications.
